chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
items.plainText: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.

items.text: Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God,
items.plainText: Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God,

items.text: Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.
items.plainText: Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.

items.text: For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.
items.plainText: For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.

items.text: For I know that the LORD is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.
items.plainText: For I know that the LORD is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.

items.text: Whatsoever the LORD pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.
items.plainText: Whatsoever the LORD pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.

items.text: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.
items.plainText: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.

items.text: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.
items.plainText: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.

items.text: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.
items.plainText: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.

items.text: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;
items.plainText: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;

items.text: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:
items.plainText: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:

items.text: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.
items.plainText: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.

items.text: Thy name, O LORD, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O LORD, throughout all generations.
items.plainText: Thy name, O LORD, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O LORD, throughout all generations.

items.text: For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.
items.plainText: For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.

items.text: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
items.plainText: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.

items.text: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;
items.plainText: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;

items.text: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.
items.plainText: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.

items.text: They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.
items.plainText: They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.

items.text: Bless the LORD, O house of Israel: bless the LORD, O house of Aaron:
items.plainText: Bless the LORD, O house of Israel: bless the LORD, O house of Aaron:

items.text: Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.
items.plainText: Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.

items.text: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
items.plainText: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
